cells.source:
# This is a public Narrative.

### It's gonna be rendered as a static HTML page with a single viewer.

It's gonna be awesome.

# Here is some code that demonstrates something. Check it out!
1+1

## Here's an old style MD cell-based viewer.
It might not work. If so, you'll see something below here:

---

kbstate.title: Here's an old style MD cell-based viewer.

cells.source:
---

If there's a markdown cell to see, it'll be above this text.

# Here's the result of rendering something in an output area of a code cell.
from biokbase.narrative.widgetmanager import WidgetManager
wm = WidgetManager()
wm.show_output_widget('kbaseGenomeView', id='Rhodobacter_CACIA_14H1')

# and show an external widget fetched from a nascent CDN
wm.show_external_widget('contigSet', 'Contig Set Demo',
               {'objectRef': '6312/12/8'}, {}, auth_required=True)
